message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product for $1000000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've placed on the product, $1000000 is higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, we're willing to consider a price of $900000. This is a compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer. We believe this price still reflects the product's worth to you.

Alice, I appreciate the compromise, but $900000 is still a bit steep for me. Given my budget constraints, I'm prepared to offer $875000.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product while also allowing us both to reach a mutually agreeable agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We understand your budget constraints, but we still need to ensure we're getting a fair price for the product. After reconsidering, we're willing to meet you halfway between our previous offer and your latest offer. We propose a price of $887500. This is our final compromise, and we hope you'll consider it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $887500 is still a bit more than I can comfortably afford.  I'm prepared to offer $850000 one last time.  This is my final offer, as I'm ready to move forward with John if we can't reach an agreement.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value while allowing us both to come to a mutually beneficial outcome.

Bob, we understand that you're willing to meet us halfway, but we can't accept your offer of $850000. We're willing to make one more concession, but we need to get closer to our minimum price. We propose a price of $880000. This is our final offer, and we hope you'll consider it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but $880000 is still outside my budget.  I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, at $865000.  I believe this is a fair compromise that allows us both to close this deal. If we can't come to an agreement at this price, I'll be forced to move forward with John.

Bob, we understand that you're willing to meet us halfway, but we can't accept your offer of $865000. We're willing to make one more concession, but we need to get closer to our minimum price. We propose a price of $875000. This is our final offer, and we hope you'll consider it.
